'''Anemo Sigils''' can be exchanged for various items at [[With Wind Comes Glory]] Sigil shop.

They can be obtained in [[Mondstadt]] by opening [[chest]]s and as rewards from the [[Statue of The Seven]].

==Trivia==
*During [[Collector of Anemo Sigils]], [[Marjorie]] says that Anemo Sigils have properties that other materials cannot provide.
